https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1TxYBgNeIw49mUAhdskb5EgaTaZ.jpg After the demolition of the Babri Masjid, Anwar, a student of Aligarh Muslim University, becomes a fundamentalist and ends up in prison. His wife Sameera yearns for him be the soft and loving husband that he once was. But what happens when he is out of jail? Daivanamathil
